name: nextjs-strapi
description: Full-stack application showcasing innovative technologies built with Next.js and Strapi

scripts.dev: npm run dev:cms & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:cms && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run start:cms & npm run start:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:cms
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:cms
scripts.postinstall: echo 'All dependencies installed successfully! Run npm run dev to start both frontend and backend.'
